original_title: Exams Commissioner appreciates FUTA’s decision on evaluating A/L answer scripts
original_body_lines: The Examinations Commissioner General today appreciates the decision taken by the Federation of University Teachers’ Association (FUTA) to take part in the evaluation of answer scripts for the 2022 (2023) Advanced Level examination.
He said that the evaluation of answer scripts for 12 subjects has already commenced.
The Commissioner General requested the FUTA to provide their contributions to the evaluation of the answer scripts of the remaining subjects immediately.
Also, the Commissioner General requested all teachers to join in the effort to complete the A/L answer script evaluation. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
